mapper.insert: insert into notice_reply (no, reply_no, reply_content, reply_writer) values (#{no}, notice_reply_seq.nextval, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer})
mapper.update: update notice_reply set reply_content=#{reply_content}, reply_regdate=sysdate where reply_no=#{reply_no}
mapper.select: select count(reply_no) from notice_reply where no=#{no}
select no from notice_reply where reply_no=#{reply_no}
